name: comment-anything-on-the-net
description: An extension that fights censorship and allows people to freely comment anything, anywhere on the net.

scripts.start: npm run build:prep && concurrently "npm run tsc:w" "npm run lite" "npm run scss:w" "npm run watch:static" "npm run watch:templates" "npm test"
scripts.watch:static: mkdir -p ./build/static && node node_modules/watch/cli.js 'cp src/static/* -R build/static' src/static/ --interval=2
scripts.watch:templates: mkdir -p ./build/app/templates && node node_modules/watch/cli.js 'cp src/app/templates/* -R build/app/templates/' src/app/templates/ --interval=2

author: Rolando Benjamin Vaz Ferreira
